chunks.text: Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Open positions at Capital One Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Open positions at Capital One Posted Tuesday, November 25, 2025 9:18 AM EST Capital One is hiring accomplished researchers and outstanding graduating PhD and MS students for Applied Researcher, Data Science, and AI Engineering positions at all levels to join Capital One AI Foundations in advancing the frontiers of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Agentic AI. We focus on the full lifecycle of LLM development—data, training, evaluation, and deployment—with emphasis on reasoning, synthetic data generation, and multi-agentic systems for solving complex tasks. We are innovating and building models and AI systems capable of solving complex, real-world problems in finance and beyond. If you are passionate about joining us on our journey to build the best AI organization in financial services by tackling the most impactful and difficult challenges at the frontier of AI, we invite you to join us. If you are interested, please email your resume to: Nicholas.peppe@capitalone.com For MS students, the link for job application: Senior Associate: https://www.capitalonecareers. com/job/new-york/senior-data- scientist-ai-foundations/1732/ 86194263456 Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 Go to Announcements >> You are receiving this message because you subscribed to receive instant notifications via email. Change Notification Settings
